Aldalala application provides you with the best possible deals, a verity of options of buying, renting cars in Sudan.

"Terms of use Welcome to the Aldalala application \\n Aldalala application provides its services to you subject to the following conditions. If you visit or use one of our services and you accept these terms, please read it carefully. In addition, when using any current or future service to apply Aldalala, visit, or use any of the business to a car company, whether incorporated or not included in the car site, you will also be subject to guidelines and conditions that apply to this service or business. Advertising content The content on the Aldalala application stems from the users and members registered in a car, and therefore the semester does not bear any responsibility for the added content and the users bear all responsibility. The indication plays a supervisory role on ads and content added by users in two ways, before adding (not including all ads) as some ads do not appear on the site except with the approval of the site administration, and the second type, after addition, where ads appear on the site and are then monitored and corrected If necessary. Therefore, members are not permitted to post advertisements that are in violation of the content policy. Car application, whether on the application or on the social media pages. Please note that such ads will be deleted directly by the site officials. As an example, but not limited to: Duplicate ads, as it is not allowed to repeat the ad more than once, instead it can be republished. And duplicate memberships where the member may not have more than one membership, and new memberships will be deleted and kept on the oldest, as they are confirmed by the content control team and then disabled. Fraud and scam ads such as: (fake ads for cars that are intended to defraud users of the site) as they are verified by the content control team and then disabled. Ads that have been proven to be an advertiser violated and were reported by other users of the site or have been shown to cause inconvenience to other users. As it is confirmed by the content monitoring team and then disabled. Advertisements for delisting cars that are old and invalid or have expired registration, and advertisements for cars or bikes that do not have valid registration. It is not permitted and the law punishes its possession or trafficking. Advertisements that are not clear and not related to the goal for which the indication was established, including but not limited to the following advertisements: (requesting financial aid, reporting a person or defamation advertisements) and their aim is to be known to individuals and companies. Announcements are required financial assistance, loans and others that require the sending of funds in advance. Regular ads, but a part of the ad specifications is on a Facebook link or an external link that is moved or downloaded and then the ad specification part is loaded from the Facebook page or the external link into the ad and the link is deleted. International advertisements for a car located outside Sudan. Safe handling tips Tips for identifying suspicious ads: Do not send any money Usually, suspicious advertisers require that funds (or part of the money) be transferred electronically The ad format and the presence of language and spelling errors Product pictures Fraudsters usually use pictures from the internet, because it is easy, and he has virtually no car. An advertisement with an attractive, illogical offer Usually, questionable advertisers place some attractive ads that are almost unbelievable. Example of a great condition car for sale for reasons of travel for half the price, so you should be careful when dealing with such advertisers. Confirm the price of the product Doubtful advertisers usually place illogical prices to attract and defraud buyers, making sure the average price of the product you want to buy. Initiation of the transaction: Check the car you want to buy well to make sure it is safe, and we also advise you to check the identification documents (if necessary) Privacy Please review the privacy policy that also governs your visit to apply the significance to further understand our practices. Content copyright All content on this site, such as texts, graphics, logos, icons, images and sound, digital downloads, and data collection, is the property of the Aldalala application and is guaranteed and protected. All content on this site is the exclusive property of the Aldalala Application. You are not entitled to copy or modify anything that is signed in terms of content. Also, you are not entitled to enter the private database or use any software that penetrates the pages of a car website. The negation of warranty and non-liability You acknowledge and agree that the use of the website and the services is entirely at your own risk and that the website and the service are provided on an \"as is\" or \"as available\" basis without any guarantees of any kind. Aldalala does not bear any guarantees or representations about the accuracy or completeness of the site’s content or the content of any third-party websites related to the site and does not bear any responsibility or accountability for any errors, personal injury or property damage of any kind, resulting from access to you and the use of the site and the service, I.e. unauthorized access to you or use of our service and/or any all personal information and/or store financial information, viruses, or the like that may be sent to you or via the website by any third party, and/or any errors or Elimination of any content or any loss or damage of any kind incurred as a result of the use of any Content published by e-mail, for transmission or availability via the website or service. Aldalala does not bear responsibility for any product or service advertised or provided by a third party through the site or any site with a hyperlink or contained in any logo or other propaganda. "
